entities.name: Mrs Weasley
entities.description: The mother of Ron and Harry, who is yelling at them through a Howler.

entities.name: Ron
entities.description: One of the recipients of the Howler, who is trying to avoid looking embarrassed in front of his peers.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The other recipient of the Howler, who has been wondering when his name would be mentioned.

entities.name: Dumbledore
entities.description: A person whose letter to Mrs Weasley is being referenced in the Howler.

relationships.description: Mrs Weasley yells at Ron through a Howler, expressing her disappointment and anger towards his behavior.
Mrs Weasley also yells at Harry through the same Howler, criticizing him for his actions and threatening to bring him back home if he misbehaves again.
Dumbledore sent a letter to Mrs Weasley the previous night, which is being referenced in the Howler.
